label: Int Contemp Modern Tech Elect
description: Progressive development of the concepts in DANC 160 and DANC 161, with emphasis on the qualitative and definitive performance of a variety of technical styles. May be repeated to a maximum of 18 hours. Prerequisite: Major standing in Dance and successful completion of two semesters of DANC 160; or consent of instructor.
courseSectionInformation: May be repeated to a maximum of 18 hours. Prerequisite: Major standing in Dance and successful completion of two semesters of DANC 160; or consent of instructor.
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Dance or Dance major(s).
classScheduleInformation: Non-dance majors admitted by audition on a space-available basis.
